modName: The Dark Gift - Relics Of The Damned
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u][i][b] [font=Comic Sans MS][size=5] [/size][/font][/b][/i][/u][i][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][size=4]The Dark Gift[/size][/size][/font][/b][/i][u][i][b][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/b][/i][/u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]For a better vampire experience, I've added potions of Vampire Blood to Skyrim based on my other mod 'Vampire Blood Potions'. You'll find them deep in the various vampire lairs across the land...[/size]

[size=3]The effect? Instant [u]Vampirism[/u]!
But will you embrace the darkness ? That has yet too be seen, Mortal.
[/size]
[/font][center][/center][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][b][size=4]Craftable Vampire Jewelry [/size][/b][/i][u][i][b]
[/b][/i][/u][size=4][size=3]All vampire jewelry from the Dawnguard DLC is now craftable, including the cut jewelry and can be enchanted.
[/size]
[size=5][b][i][size=4]Relics Of The Damned [/size][/i][/b][u][b][i]
[/i][/b][/u][b][size=4][size=3]Vampire relics have been added to Skyrim for you to find throughout your adventures, where are they ? One lays in Dim Hollow, where an ancient necromancer fell ;) , another lays with one that was once a hunter of the damned, but became one with them. The rest ? You're on your own now, good luck.
[/size]
[size=3]I've also added a little something from Oblivion, in the[/size][/size][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b] Falkreath [/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary [/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][size=4][size=5][b][size=4][size=3](near the Night Mother) [/size]

[size=5][size=4]NOT COMPATIBLE WITH VAMPIRE BLOOD POTIONS OR THE HE VERSION!!![/size][/size][u][size=5]

[/size][/u][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4]About this mod[/size][/size][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][size=5][size=4][size=3]It aims to make exploration in Skyrim more rewarding without going over the top, deep in some of the places vampires call home, relics with powerful enchantments can be found. I think they fit into the game well, since we won't see another Elder Scrolls game anytime soon I felt like I should add something to Skyrim. Seven relics in total can be found, not in every vampire lair of course, I've placed them so you can stumble upon them throughout an entire playthrough. [/size]

[i]That is all, mortals and creatures of the night. Enjoy and HAVE FUN! [/i][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font]
author: Arenthia
